abstract: local players enjoying time at national all-american games .
article: the under armour all-america and u. s. army all-american games are set for this week and there is no shortage of houston talent on the respective rosters , as usual . there are nine area players set for the under armour all-america game on thursday at camping world stadium in orlando . the game is televised on espn2.another seven area players are at the u. s. army all-american bowl on saturday inside san antonio 's alamodome . that game is on nbc .

local under armour all-americans : justin mader , long snapper - magnoliaseth small , kicker -- katy malcolm epps , tight end -- dekaney d'shawn jamison , cornerback -- lamar al ` vonte woodard , wide receiver -- texas jalen preston , wide receiver -- manvel keondre coburn , defensive tackle -- westfield mustapha muhammad , tight end -- ridge point b. j. foster , safety -- angleton local u. s. army all-americans : colten blanton , offensive lineman -- cypress ranch anthony cook , cornerback -- lamar brennan eagles , wide receiver -- alief taylor jalen green , defensive back -- heights luke matthews , offensive lineman -- elkins leon o'neal , defensive back -- cypress springs jaylen waddle , wide receiver -- episcopal players have been active on social media during the week leading up to the game .

malcolm epps , for example , enjoys one of the perks of being an under armour all-american -- the players ' lounge . lamar defensive backs coach theadis reagins is one of the assistants for the game . he had the chance to hang with the g. o.a. t at practice . alief taylor receiver brennan eagles seems to be enjoying his time in san antonio . magnolia 's justin mader is one of the best long snappers in the country . kickers need love , too . especially one as talented as katy 's seth small . lamar 's d'shawn jamison showing off the under armour gear .

heights ' jalen green & lamar 's anthony cook are going to be a force in texas ' secondary . the black jersey suits westfield defensive tackle keondre coburn well . cypress springs safety leon o'neal revels in the moment as a u. s. army all-american . and episcopal 's jaylen waddle is still one of the country 's top unsigned recruits . the under armour all-american game will be televised by espn2 on thursday and the u. s. army all-american bowl will be televised by nbc on saturday .
